headers.subject: [p4] p4 protect -- order of entries
headers.in-reply-to: <E34BFDAD0D43D4119FFA009027CB5288037C0A78@tsexch01.int.loudeye.com>; from Matthew.Goos@loudeye.com on Fri, Nov 16, 2001 at 01:12:56PM -0800

body.para: On Fri, Nov 16, 2001 at 01:12:56PM -0800, Matthew Goos wrote:

quote.quotepara: "Perforce makes the first of two passes through the protections table. Both passes move up the protections table, bottom to top, looking for the first relevant line."

body.para: The phrase "the first relevant line" is the key here.
Once it finds a match, it stops looking.
So, do general configuration towards the top, and specific ones towards the bottom.
